TermsConfirmationOverlayFooterText3.message: for information on how we process your personal data.

TermsConfirmationOverlaySubTitle.message: Opting in enhances your browsing with advanced features through our affiliates' technologies. This helps us improve and personalize your experience, though it involves sharing some data. You're always in control and can adjust your settings anytime. Opt in for full benefits and features! You may opt-out at any time through “Your Privacy Choices” within the settings menu. If you opt out, features that rely on these technologies will no longer work.

aboutBlockCategoriesSubtitle.message: Quickly block a whole category with a toggle of a button.

aboutCreateBlockListsSubtitle.message: Add the websites or pages you want to block to your Site List and get automatically redirected to safer, more positive sites. You can also create a list of friendly sites, and switch from blocking specific sites to only allowing certain sites to work.

aboutHowToEnableInInPrivateSubtitle.message: To enable BlockSite in Edge's InPrivate mode, follow these steps:

aboutHowToEnableInIncognitoSubtitle.message: To enable Block Site in Chrome’s Incognito Mode, follow these steps:

aboutIncognitoSubtitle.message: All the Block Site functionality can also work in the incognito mode, you just need to allow it. Follow these instructions to see how it is done:

aboutKeepInternetSafeSubtitle.message: Activate Adult Block via the extension menu to block all adult sites in a single click.

aboutPasswordSubtitle.message: Set Up a password in the Settings page to limit the access to Block Site Options, or to enable the option to access blocked sites with a password.

aboutRateUsSubtitle.message: If you find Block Site useful, please rate it in the Chrome Webstore. We would highly appreciate it.

aboutRateUsTitle.message: Like us? Let The World Know.

aboutRightClickMenuSubtitle.message: Right click anywhere on any website to open the quick access menu. Block sites in seconds to avoid procrastination and stay on target.

aboutScheduleSubtitle.message: Choose days and intervals in which you want Block Site to be active. Set up custom blocks based on your work schedule (for example: 09:00 - 17:00), so you won’t procrastinate during the day, when at work or at school.

aboutSubtitle.message: Block Site enables you to stay focused and improve your productivity. You can easily block any distracting or harmful website. No willpower necessary.

productivityInsights_quotes_0_0.message: You haven't saved hours yet, now is the perfect time to give it a try. Saving hours can be a great way to reclaim your time, focus on what matters most to you, and explore new activities or interests.

productivityInsights_quotes_10_0.message: Plan a day of exploring local trails on a bike, enjoying a scenic bike ride through parks, nature reserves, or countryside paths.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_10.message: Plan a day of water activities, such as kayaking, paddleboarding, or canoeing, on a nearby lake or river.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_11.message: Take a day trip to a nearby winery or vineyard, enjoying wine tastings, tours, and picturesque views of the vineyards.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_12.message: Attend a full-day fitness or wellness retreat, participating in yoga, meditation, and fitness classes to enhance your physical and mental well-being.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_13.message: Plan a day of exploring local trails and parks, going on nature walks and discovering hidden gems in your area.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_14.message: Dedicate the day to a personal passion project, whether it's writing, painting, coding, or any other creative endeavor that you've been meaning to pursue.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_2.message: Visit a nearby wildlife sanctuary or nature reserve, spending the day observing and learning about various species of animals and plants.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_3.message: Plan a day of pampering at a luxury spa, indulging in massages, facials, and other relaxing treatments to rejuvenate your mind and body.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_4.message: Attend a full-day creative workshop, such as painting, pottery, or photography, and immerse yourself in a day of artistic expression.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_5.message: Organize a day-long hiking and picnic adventure with friends, choosing a trail that leads to a scenic spot where you can enjoy a picnic lunch.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_6.message: Take a day trip to a nearby coastal town or beach destination, spending the day relaxing on the sandy shores and taking refreshing dips in the sea.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_7.message: Plan a day of exploring local markets and shops, indulging in some retail therapy and discovering unique items and local products.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_8.message: Attend a day-long music or dance festival, immersing yourself in live performances, workshops, and cultural experiences.

productivityInsights_quotes_9_9.message: Visit a nearby historical site or museum and spend the day delving into the rich history and heritage of the location.
